channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13218] LLAP: better configs part 1
item.description:
1) IO threads need to be settable when creating the package, and should be equal to the number of executors by default.
2) uber should be disabled in "all" mode as it's slower than running in LLAP.

Maybe others.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
